sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
straight
, se nadaljuje v isto smer in se ne upogne in ne zvije.

seg.quote: I saw the car coming straight at me.

sense.def:
A straight position
je pokončen ali vodoraven položaj, ne nagnjen ali upognjen.

seg.quote: Keep your knees bent and your back straight.
Check that all the pictures hang straight.

sense.def:
To go straight to a place
pomeni iti takoj v neki kraj.

seg.quote: The doctor told me to go straight to bed.

sense.def:
To be straight with someone
pomeni z nakom govoriti pošteno in odkrito.

seg.quote: I just want a straight answer to the question.

sense.def:
A straight choice
ali
a straight fight
je izbira ali boj, v katerega sta vpleteni le dve osebi ali stvari.

seg.quote: The voters have a straight choice between the two candidates.

sense.def:
To get something straight
pomeni prepričati se, da smo nekaj pravilno razumeli;

To be going straight
pomeni ne biti več udeležen v zločinski dejavnosti, če si bil prej zločinec.

To keep a straight face
pomeni, da se nam posreči, da se ne zasmejemo.
